hero.description: Join our mission to collect, preserve, and share the rich cultural heritage of Kabylie through a comprehensive digital archive of audio, video, and images.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: As students from Kabylie, we are dedicated to preserving and sharing the rich cultural heritage of our people through a comprehensive digital archive that connects generations and celebrates our unique identity.

cards.title: Global Accessibility
cards.description: Making Kabyle cultural heritage accessible to the world, connecting diaspora and global audiences.

cards.title: Educational Resource
cards.description: Providing authentic resources about Kabyle culture, history, and language for researchers and learners.

cards.title: Community Empowerment
cards.description: Empowering the Kabyle community to preserve and share their own cultural heritage.

libraryPreview.description: A comprehensive digital repository preserving the rich cultural heritage of Kabylie through diverse media types.

categories.title: Video Archives
categories.description: Explore documentaries, interviews, and cultural recordings that bring Kabyle history to life.

categories.title: Image Gallery
categories.description: Explore a rich collection of photographs documenting Kabyle traditions, landscapes, and daily life.

categories.title: Audio Collections
categories.description: Listen to traditional music, oral histories, and linguistic recordings preserving Kabyle heritage.

categories.title: Textual Resources
categories.description: Access scholarly articles, personal narratives, and historical documents about Kabyle culture.

cta.description: Your contribution can help document and protect the rich cultural legacy of Kabylie. Share your family's stories, artifacts, and memories.

testimonials.description: Hear from those who have contributed to and benefited from our cultural archive, sharing their personal connections and insights.

items.quote: This project has allowed me to share my grandmother's traditional songs with a global audience. I'm grateful for the opportunity to preserve these treasures for future generations.
items.author: Amar B.

items.quote: As a researcher studying Amazigh cultures, this database has been an invaluable resource. The multimedia approach provides a rich context that traditional archives often lack.
items.author: Dr. Lynda M.

items.quote: Growing up away from Kabylie, this platform has helped me reconnect with my heritage and discover cultural traditions I never knew existed in my family's region.
items.author: Sabrina T.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Our Wide Range of Services for Your Business
services.description: We are a leading digital agency that provides a wide range of services to help you achieve your business goals.

mediaLibrary.title: Kabyle Heritage Media Library
mediaLibrary.description: Discover the rich cultural heritage of Kabylia through our extensive collection of texts, audio recordings, videos, and images.

contributeCTA.title: Contribute to the Kabylia Media Library
contributeCTA.description: Help preserve and share the richness of Kabyle culture by contributing your own resources to our digital library.

about.paragraph1: We are a digital agency that turns bold ideas into powerful digital experiences. From websites to mobile apps, we build solutions that make a real difference for businesses.
about.paragraph2: We are experts in design and development, with a focus on business-supporting solutions. We're passionate about delivering exceptional results because we see technology as a bridge between today's challenges and tomorrow's opportunities ‚Äì helping businesses adapt, grow, and thrive in an increasingly digital world.
